contentrichtext.text: '''CCX''' may mean: *[[Chicago Climate Exchange]]. *[[Con-Way Central Express]], one of two original [[Con-way|Con-Way]] regional less-than-truckload freight carriers *.CCX, the file extension used for [[Campaign Cartographer]]s symbol libraries. *[[Cisco Compatible EXtensions]] specification for 802.11 wireless LAN chip manufacturers. *[[Koenigsegg CCX]] sports car. *[[CyberConXion]], a computer services/internet cafÃ© company. *[[CargoConnect]], a service provided by BT which allows forwarders and shippers to check the status of air cargo consignments. *[[Cat's Corner Exchange]], a [[swing dance]] [[Lindy exchange|lindy and blues exchange]] in [[Montreal]], [[Canada]]. *[[210 (number)|CCX]] The number 210 in [[Roman numerals]] *The year [[210]] (CCX years) *CCX, the coal mining company that is controlled by the Brazilian conglomerate, [[EBX Group]]. It operates greenfield coal mining facilities in Columbia. {{disambiguation}}
